Hi all,
I am new to the subject and i have big question: Could i migrate my 
application from an object-oriented  architecture to a restful one?
In my application my clients are java based and my servers are C++ comet 
based application and communication is done thanks to corba.
How can i adapt a rest desug in this case? My servers can not understand 
http request , Do i have absolutely develop an adptor in order to 
communicate?
Does anyone have any experience like this?
Thanks
Samya
